description:
Track and evaluate the performance of your investment portfolio across stocks, cryptocurrencies, and other assets.


- New: PDF importer for Estateguru, Alpac Capital, and WitheBox
- Improvements to the PDF importers for Trade Republic, Baader Bank, Easybank, 1822direkt, AKF Bank, Tiger Broker, DZ Bank, and KDC Bank NV
- Fix: Resolves an issue where an error in the price query prevented further price retrieval.
- Fix: The "Delta % Indicator" in the rebalancing view now only applies the absolute change to all classified instruments (5/25 rule).
